channel.title: Posts on Astero Games
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Astero Games

item.title: What is all this about?
item.description: Hello! First off thanks for looking around. This blog will be used to post: Game dev logs Unity tutorials Web dev tutorials (basics) Gameplay mechanics Game art postss With most of the posts related to the first Astero Games comercial project, I hope you enjoy the content and if you have any comment don’t hesitate in contact me
